Responsibilities included organizing the personal and professional papers of the late mythologist, Joseph Campbell. Designing and managing FileMaker Pro and Microsoft Access databases used to organize information related to these papers and information regarding the Collected Works of Joseph Campbell (publication history, book reviews, notes, letters of correspondence, lectures, etc.). This position emphasized my ability to accomplish projects independently and required complete self-direction.
